stimulusHtml: If the current exchange rate of the Mexican peso and the Brazilian real is 0.20 real per peso, and the equilibrium exchange rate is 0.18 real per peso, which of the following describes the foreign exchange market for the Mexican peso?
choicesHtml: There is a shortage of pesos and the peso will appreciate.
There is a shortage of pesos and the peso will depreciate.
There is a surplus of pesos and the peso will appreciate.
There is a surplus of pesos and the peso will depreciate.
There is a surplus of pesos and the real will depreciate.
